00097         enum State {
00098                 CLOSE   = 0,
00099                 TIMEOUT = 1,
00100                 BROKEN  = 2,
00101                 RESET   = 3,
00102                 CONNECT = 4,
00103                 LOGIN   = 5
00104         };
00105 
00106         USocket(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false)
00107                 {
00108                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USocket, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00109 
00110                 iState      = CLOSE;
00111                 iSockDesc   = -1;
00112                 bLocalSet   = false;
00113 #ifdef HAVE_IPV6
00114                 bIPv6Socket = bSocketIsIPv6;
00115 #else
00116                 bIPv6Socket = false;
00117 #endif
00118 
00119                 if (str_range == 0) str_allocate();
00120                 }
00121 
00122         virtual ~USocket()
00123                 {
00124                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USocket)
00125 
00126                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("iSockDesc = %d", iSockDesc)
00127 
00128                 if (isOpen()) USocket::closesocket();
00129                 }
00130 
00131         int  getFd() const               { return  iSockDesc; }
00132         bool isOpen() const      { return (iSockDesc != -1); }
00133         bool isReset() const     { return (iState == RESET); }
00134         bool isLogin() const     { return (iState == LOGIN); }
00135         bool isClosed() const    { return (iSockDesc == -1); }
00136         bool isBroken() const    { return (iState == BROKEN); }
00137         bool isTimeout() const   { return (iState == TIMEOUT); }
00138         bool isSysError() const  { return (iState  < CLOSE); }
00139         bool isConnected() const { return (iState >= CONNECT); }

00145         void checkErrno(int value);
00146 
00151         bool checkIO(int iBytesTransferred, int iMaxBytesTransfer);

00159         static int socket(int domain, int type, int protocol)
00160                 {
00161                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::socket(%d,%d,%d)", domain, type, protocol)
00162 
00163                 int fd = U_SYSCALL(socket, "%d,%d,%d", domain, type, protocol);
00164 
00165                 U_RETURN(fd);
00166                 }
00167 
00168         bool socket(int iSocketType, int protocol = 0)
00169                 {
00170                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::socket(%d,%d)", iSocketType, protocol)
00171 
00172                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isClosed())
00173 
00174                 iSockDesc = socket(bIPv6Socket ? AF_INET6 : AF_INET, iSocketType, protocol);
00175 
00176                 U_RETURN(isOpen());
00177                 }
00178 
00179         void close()
00180                 {
00181                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::close()")
00182 
00183                 closesocket();
00184 
00185                 iState = CLOSE;
00186                 }
00187 
00192         bool getSockOpt(int iCodeLevel, int iOptionName, void* pOptionData, uint32_t& iDataLength)
00193                 {
00194                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::getSockOpt(%d,%d,%p,%p)", iCodeLevel, iOptionName, pOptionData, iDataLength)
00195 
00196                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00197 
00198                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00199 
00200                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(getsockopt, "%d,%d,%d,%p,%p", iSockDesc, iCodeLevel, iOptionName, CAST(pOptionData), (socklen_t*)&iDataLength) == 0);
00201 
00202                 U_RETURN(result);
00203                 }
00204 
00209         bool setSockOpt(int iCodeLevel, int iOptionName, const void* pOptionData, uint32_t iDataLength)
00210                 {
00211                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::setSockOpt(%d,%d,%p,%u)", iCodeLevel, iOptionName, pOptionData, iDataLength)
00212 
00213                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00214 
00215                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00216 
00217                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(setsockopt, "%d,%d,%d,%p,%u", iSockDesc, iCodeLevel, iOptionName, CAST(pOptionData), iDataLength) == 0);
00218 
00219                 U_RETURN(result);
00220                 }

00226         bool connectServer(const UIPAddress& cAddr, int iServPort)
00227                 {
00228                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::connectServer(%p,%d)", &cAddr, iServPort)
00229 
00230                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00231 
00232                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00233 
00234                 iRemotePort    = iServPort;
00235                 cRemoteAddress = cAddr;
00236 
00237                 if (connect()) U_RETURN(true);
00238 
00239                 U_RETURN(false);
00240                 }

00343         const char* getRemoteInfo()
00344                 {
00345                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::getRemoteInfo()")
00346 
00347                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00348 
00349                 const char* address = (iRemotePort ? cRemoteAddress.getAddressString() : "localhost");
00350

00354         void getRemoteInfo(UString& buffer)
00355                 {
00356                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::getRemoteInfo(%p)", &buffer)
00357 
00358                 const char* address = getRemoteInfo();
00359 
00360                 int len = u_snprintf(buffer.data(), buffer.capacity(), "%2d '%s:%u'", iSockDesc, address, iRemotePort);
00361 
00362                 buffer.size_adjust(len);
00363                 }

00369         uint32_t getBufferRCV()
00370                 {
00371                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::getBufferRCV()")
00372 
00373                 uint32_t size, tmp = sizeof(uint32_t);
00374 
00375                 getSockOpt(SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&size, tmp);
00376 
00377                 U_RETURN(size);
00378                 }

00506         int recvBinary16Bits()
00507                 {
00508                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recvBinary16Bits()")
00509 
00510                 uint16_t uiNetOrder;
00511                 int iBytesLeft = sizeof(uint16_t);
00512                 char* pcEndReadBuffer = ((char*)&uiNetOrder) + iBytesLeft;
00513 
00514                 do {
00515                         iBytesLeft -= recv((void*)(pcEndReadBuffer - iBytesLeft), iBytesLeft);
00516                         }
00517                 while (iBytesLeft);
00518 
00519                 U_RETURN((int)ntohs(uiNetOrder));
00520                 }
00521 
00529         uint32_t recvBinary32Bits()
00530                 {
00531                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recvBinary32Bits()")
00532 
00533                 uint32_t uiNetOrder;
00534                 int iBytesLeft = sizeof(uint32_t);
00535                 char* pcEndReadBuffer = ((char*)&uiNetOrder) + iBytesLeft;
00536 
00537                 do {
00538                         iBytesLeft -= recv((void*)(pcEndReadBuffer - iBytesLeft), iBytesLeft);
00539                         }
00540                 while (iBytesLeft);
00541 
00542                 U_RETURN(ntohl(uiNetOrder));
00543                 }
00544 
00551         bool sendBinary16Bits(int iData)
00552                 {
00553                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::sendBinary16Bits(%d)", iData)
00554 
00555                 uint16_t uiNetOrder = htons(iData);
00556 
00557                 bool result = (send(&uiNetOrder, sizeof(uint16_t)) == sizeof(uint16_t));
00558 
00559                 U_RETURN(result);
00560                 }
00561 
00568         bool sendBinary32Bits(uint32_t lData)
00569                 {
00570                 U_TRACE(0, "UTCPSocket::sendBinary32Bits(%u)", lData)
00571 
00572                 uint32_t uiNetOrder = htonl(lData);
00573 
00574                 bool result = (send(&uiNetOrder, sizeof(uint32_t)) == sizeof(uint32_t));
00575 
00576                 U_RETURN(result);
00577                 }

00628         virtual int recv(void* pBuffer, int iBufLength)
00629                 {
00630                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recv(%p,%d)", pBuffer, iBufLength)
00631 
00632                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00633 
00634                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00635 
00636                 int iBytesRead = recv(iSockDesc, CAST(pBuffer), iBufLength, 0);
00637 
00638                 U_RETURN(iBytesRead);
00639                 }

00662         static int req_timeout,         // the time-out value in seconds for client send request
00663                                   accept4_flags;        // If flags is 0, then accept4() is the same as accept()
00664 
00665         bool connect();

00670         static bool isBlocking()
00671                 {
00672                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::isBlocking()")
00673 
00674                 if (req_timeout &&
00675                          accept4_flags == 0)
00676                         {
00677                         U_RETURN(true);
00678                         }
00679 
00680                 U_RETURN(false);
00681                 }
